qas.question: Which part of Brazil observes Daylight Saving Time?
What part of Brazil does not observe DST?
Which two continents that comprise a majority of the population worldwide don't observe DST?
The lack of fluctuation in time for what daily event means regions of the world near the equator don't usually keep DST?

context: DST is generally not observed near the equator, where <a3_0>sunrise<a3_0/> times do not vary enough to justify it. Some countries observe it only in some regions; for example, <a0_0>southern Brazil<a0_0/> observes it while <a1_0>equatorial Brazil<a1_0/> does not. Only a minority of the world's population uses DST because <a2_0>Asia and Africa<a2_0/> generally do not observe it.
